intro: Vanda stella, commonly known as the star orchid, is a tropical epiphytic orchid native to Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its striking, star-shaped flowers that range in color from white to pink and purple. The plant has long, slender stems and broad,革质 leaves that help it thrive in humid, shaded environments. Vanda stella is known for its ability to bloom multiple times a year, making it a popular choice for orchid enthusiasts. Its botanical features make it well-suited for cultivation in greenhouses or as a houseplant with proper care.
